S.FORM: = Netherlands = Gaga kska Owcow ka Netherlands, 52 30 N, 5 45 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 41,543 sq km(hangan na o Tg135) (knlbanga dxgal o 33,893 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 7,650 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 17,016,967 hiyi. Gaga Amsterdam ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 27 idas 4 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal Netherlands ga wada sugan 55.10% ka dxgal qpahan, 10.80% ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 34.10% na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Willem-Alexander, pnaah hngkawas2013 idas 4 jiyax 30pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Ri-s Ini qlhangi Roma Tikwo brah cida ka Netherlands han pa, niqan ka qnbhangan kari sediq Kyle mi sediq Germanic ka mnniq hini. Qnlhangan Moma Tikwo jiday na Netherlands (BC. Kngkawas 55-410) Mniq mncbiyaw Roma jiday, nniqan Yayung Rhine brah u 'mnBelgium Gaul' Sng han, hiti daw wada 'mnGermanic Sing Sng'. Nniqan tudaya u niqan hbaraw bay alang Germanic ka mniq hiyi, tuhunac ka sediq Gaul, kiya mi dsediq Gaul niyi u mniq thdil cida u wada pspuwan ou bay alang Germanic uri, kcka niya sediq Salion Frank u snpeyyah hini wada thdil Gaul, kiya mi mniq kongweyn 5 th wada phiyu kiya ka mbiyax na balay Merlot Wangcaw . Habsburg jiday na Netherlands (Kngkawas 1519-1581) Tukcka th, qnlhangan mniq dxral rrbuq (To bay knkana nniqan Netherlands, nniqan tuiwil Doicu, Luxembourg, Belgium, duma nniqan tudaya France) mnniqan ou balay cuho fongcyeyn tndxral, psnakan mnBourgogne mi Snpruwan Balay Roma Tikwo. Dhuq 16 th bhah cida, alaw mrrimax na hwangsu msturung, dhiya u mniq kcka snpruwan Roma Tikwo Habsburg Wangcaw cida wada pskngalan. Kngkawas 1556 tikwo hwangti Charlie 5 th (Kngkawas 1519-1556 ngalan bukung) malix bukung, wada niya psuwan laqi niya Philip 2 th ka Spain mi rrbuq dxrasl (Wada splawa Tudaya Sng), wada niya subway swayi na Ferdinand ka Austria mi duma nniqan mi Habsburg Wangcaw cngtong. So kiya, Tudaya Nniqan Sng u mnSpain Wangkwo. Netherlands 7 Sng Konghkwo Jiday (Kngkawas 1581-1795) Kngkawas 1568, alaw knciyuk Spain Wangkwo congyang cicweyn mi tmraqil Kiristokyo Burah Kyokay Calvin Pay, pspuruq Tudaya Sng knciyuk Spain mccbu 80 kngkawas. Kngkawas 1579 Tudaya Sng kcka 7 Sng (nniqan dxral Netherland, Belgiuum mi Luxembourg saya) wada phiyu Utrecht Tongmong, msupu muda knciyuk qlhangan Spain. Niyi u kiya ka prading ngalan Netherlands saya. Kngkawas 1581, ryeynmong u mndungus bay pkla kari dukuricu. Lmutuc ka mccbu, dhuq kngkawas 1648 bukung qnlhangan Spain Philip 4 th ka hana psdhu pbatas "Patas Pnsdhuwan Munster", smruwa 7 dxral rbuq (Netherlands)/ 7 Sng Ryeynho Konghkwo, speyyah Spain mangal dukuricu daw, Netherlands u wada pkrana mu17 th mtnucilung mi mawyi mbiyax qnlhangan. Netherlands u mniq qnlangan knkingal dxral phiyu qlhangan mi nniqan mawyi, kiya ka knkana duma nniqan Taiwan pa mniq kngkawas 1624 dhuq kngkawas 1662 mi kngkawas 1664 dhuq kngkawas 1667 cida pa mndxral qlhangan Netherlands uri. Diyax iyax niyi pa mniq Netherlands u ngalan dha diyax 'King Jiday'. Kndadax prading dhuq hiti u wada ptrawah mi qmlahang 4 dxral nniqan, kiya ka New Youk, Tuhunac Afrika, Indonesia mi Taiwan. 17 th thiti daw, Netherlands pa brah mi bukuy u mnccbu Ingkoku mi France, mniq ucilung u wada ini baka Ingkoku ku ka Netherlands (Mccbu Ingkoku mi Netherlands), mniq dxral u wada ini baka France ka Netherlands (Mccbu France mi Netherlands), kndadax hiya daw kiya ka wada kndudul mtuting ka biyax dha da. Kngkawas 1740 (Kngkawas Cing Cyeynrong 5) idas 10 diyax 9-12, mnniq Java Batawiya (wa mniq Indonesia Java Taw Jakarta saya) pspuruq sediq Netherlands phuqil Hwajn tnhdilan na Hongsi Canan, Hwajn u hmrinas knbkiyan hiyi ka wada mhuqil. Wada ulkan knrmux France jiday (Kngkawas 1795-1814) Kngkawas 1795 cida wada ulkan knrmux France Tikwo ka Netherlands, Napoleon brah mi bukuy pa mniq hini muda dmudul Batawiya Konghkwo mi Netherlands Wangkwo. Netherlands Wangkwo Jiday (Kngkawas 1815-1940) Wada mnhdu qnlhangan Napoleon kngkawas 1815 cida ka Franse daw, Netherlands mi Belgium saya, Luxembourg saya u wada msupu pnsliyan Netherlands Wangkwo. Belgium u wada ini biyaw mniq kngkawas 1830 dukuricu, Luxembourg uri u wada msnul dukuricu uri, tndxral Netherlands u wada nanaq lmutuc Netherlands Wangkwo. Tumndha Knbeyhing Mccbu Qnlangan (Kngkawas 1940-1945) Netherlands mniq kcka Tumn1 Knbeyhing Mccbu Qnlangan pa muda congri kiya. Netherlands u mniq kcka Tumn2 Knbeyhing Mccbu Qnlangan kndadax kngkawas 1940 idas 5 cida wada yahan ulkan knrmux Doicu, dhuq kngkawas 1945 cida u hana wada plaxan qmlahang. Babaw mnhdu mnccbu jiday (Kngkawas 1945 dhuq saya) Babaw mnccbu daw, wada mntxan mtutuy mi mdakil mkrana ka keyjay Netherlands Dungan. Netherlands ka B (Belgium), Ho (Netherlands), L (Luxembourg) na mnsupu tumal Keyjay Ryeynmong, O Co Keyjay Kongtongti mi Tudaya Pnsdhuwan niya. Mniq kngkawas 1945 idas 12 diyax 15, Netherlands u wada dha pdaun ka "Patas Pnsdhuwan Netherlands Wangkwo" (Het Statuut), kiya ida nanaq dxral qlhangan Netherlands mi mndxral dha pa mniq kcka wangkwo mi tndxral Netherlands u niqan mntna hniwan dha kana. Snpeyyah hiya cida Netherlands Wangkwo u tmiyu tndxral Netherlands mi pnsliyan duma brah qmnlhangan dxral na wangkwo, kiya mi 'Netherlands' u wana nanaq tmiyu O Co Talu Netherlands. Netherlands Wangkwo saya u niqan 4 nniqan dxral, kiya ka O Co Talu Netherlands, Aruba, Curacao mi mnNetherlands Martin, kiya mi Hanajima, Sint Eustatius Taw mi mn Netherlands Sabah Taw u wada pspuwan tndxral Netherlands mi wada ngalan tukubeycu singcngcyu kiya da. Ti-ri O Co cyu Netherlands Mbrnux ka lnlingay dxral Netherlands tukubeycu na balay. Tndxral qnlhangan dha pa hmrinas dmka u ini khrinas 1m ka haypa niya, 26% dxral u ini knrinas knbaraw ucilung. Duma nniqan u spuda qnriyan ucilung mi wada smluwan dxral nniqan, mray so nniqan knkana dxral Flevoland Sng. Rrbuq dxral niyi u to wada smluwan qnalang sbangan ucilung kana muda qmlahang nniqan dha. Kiya mi sediq Netherlands u kndadax cbiyaw dhuq saya mppluk dxral ucilung, qnita dha sediq Netherlands pa knbeyhing balay payis dha ka ucilung. Knbaraw bay dxral O Co cyu Netherlands pa kiya ka wa mniq qnlhangan dha tunarac hunac balay na Dwiyaq Vals, hapa 321m, binaw knkana balay Netherlands tubaraw balay ka wa mniq Ucilung Caribean Sabah Taw na Ddwiyaq Landscape, knbaraw niya u 887m, hini u kiya ka knbaraw na balay knkana Netherlands Wangkwo uri. Yayung Rhine, Yayung Val mi Yayung Mas u wada dha psdkanan m2 ka Netherlands. Rngecux qsiya Kndadax cbiyaw, alaw qnrqilan ida nkiya mi tumal ka ssediq, Netherlands na ayus mkngalu ucilung u ida ini sangay knpriyux. Niqan bay hnhangan ka ndanan kngkawas 1134 knbeyhing bwihur, wada sqrbuq bungan kcka ucilung ka knou bay dxral dha, kiya ka smnlanan ka Zeeland Sng tuiwil hunac na cyutaw. Kngkawas 1278 idas 12 diyax 14 cida, Qnrqilan Rngecux Saint Lucia u wada niqan hmrinas 5 knbkiyan hiyi sediq ka mrdang Netherlands mi Doicu, kiya ndanan rikisi Netherlands knchdil balay mn1 qnrqilan rngecux uri. Kngkawas 1421 Rngecux Qnrqilan Sng Elisabeth daw, wada smliq knou bay dxral qnpahan, niqan 72 pinghwang km na Biesbosch cawsi rngecux mbrnux ka pcriyu. Kngkawas 1953 idas 2, Ucilung Tudaya u yahan rngecux qsiya, wada sliqan rngecux ka knou balay sbangan ucilung tuiwil hunac Netherlands, niqan hmrinas 1,800 hiyi sediq ka wada dsun rngecux mi mrdang. So kiya u seyhu Netherlands ka muda keykaku knbeyhing bay qndahang rrngecux, kiya ka muda qmlahang qnlhangan dha so ini yahi knrmux rrngecux, kcka niqan bay hnhangan niya ka Turu Hungun Co kongcng. Kngkarac O Co cyu Netherlands yupan balaybwihur snpeyyah Acores kawya bwihur tuiwil hunac, kngkarac mnMtilux Hari Hayyangsing, misan ka muxul mi mtltu ka rbawan, qnyuxan qsiya tnkawas u 650-700 hwami. Binaw Ucilung Caribbean na Bonaire u kngkarac mnMtilux Dmka Kndnguwan; Sabah mi Sng Eustatius ka nniqan mtilux mi mhuriq. Netherlands Caribbean Cyu Netherlands Caribbean Cyu ka 3 tndxral tukubeycu singcngcyu: Bonaire Taw, Sng Eustatius Taw mi mnNetherlands Sabah Taw na pnspuwan hangan, splawa dha BES tawyu uri. Singcng cyuhwa Nniqan O Co Netherlands pa psnakan 12 Sng:荷蘭分為12個省: Groningen Sng- Tunarac daya, Sng huy ka Groningen. 格羅寧根省— Friesland Sng- Tudaya, Sng huy ka Revaden. 菲士蘭省—北部,省會是雷瓦登 Drenthe Sng- Tunarac daya, tuhunac Groningen, Sng huy ka Assen. 德倫特省— Baraw Esser- Tunarac, tuhunac Drenthe, Sng huy ka Zwolle. 上愛塞省— Flevoland Sng- Tukckas, Ijsselmeer, Sng huy ka Lelystad. 夫利佛蘭省— Gelderland Sng- Tunarac, tuhunac Baraw Esser, Sng huy ka Arnhem. Utrecht Sng- Tukcka, Sng huy ka Utrecht. 烏特勒支省—中部,省會是烏特勒支 Tudaya Netherlands Sng- Tuiwil daya, Sng huy ka Hallam. Tuhunac Netherlands Sng- Tukcka mquru tuiwil, Sng huy ka Hague. Zeeland Sng- Tuiwil hunac, Sng huy ka Middelburg. Tudaya Brabant Sng- Tuhunac, Sng huy ka Shertogenbosch. Limburg Sng- Tunarac hunac, lmutuc dhuq Belgium, Sng huy ka Mestreech. . Trahuc Sng u phiyu Su Cn (gemeenten), sani mita ka seyji Su Cn Netherlands. 省下設市鎮(gemeenten),參見荷蘭市鎮政治. Nniqan Ucilungc Caribbean Seyji Cngtang Kndadax kngkawas 1581 dhuq kngkawas 1806, Netherlands ka kongh ticu, binaw uxay pnwaya gikay mincu qnlhangan. Babar niya kngkawas 1806 dhuq kngkawas 1815, wada dan tnayis qmlahang France ka Netherlands. Kndadax kngkawas 1815 prading, Netherlands ida nanaq pnwaya bungkung phiyu keyngpo na qnlhangan. Snpeyyah kngkawas 2013, bukung qnlhangan William Alexander ka muda psdhu phyuwan weynso qnlhangan dhuq saya. Balay balay mndungus kari pa, bukung qnlhangan u niqan biyax psdhu phiyu pnspuwan mpqpah seyhu. Balay bay u spuda ndanan seyngkyo phiyu ryeynho seyhu, kiya daw spuda bukung qnlhangan ka muda pkla kari uuda psdhu pusu tunux seyhu. Netherlands gikay u pnspuwan turuma giying (Tu2 ying) mi tubaraw (tu1 ying). 150 hiyi gying ka pnspuwan turuma giying, mk4 kngkawas muda seyngkyo mn1, malu mtbrah knpriyux seyngkyo uri, kiya u pnwaya seyngkyo u pnwaya piri dayhyo. Alaw hbaraw ka cngtang turuma giying, so kiya seyngkyo daw uka brahan spuda murux taxa cngtang ka malu pssli seyhu, so kiya daw muda pssli seyhu iyax niya u ya bay musa mkpiya idas hari, binaw ryeynho seyhu u kasi ka mniq turuma giying mangal knhbrawan ging ka smruwah dmkuh, binaw ana ini angal knhbrawan hiyi giying tubaraw giying ka smruwa dmkuh. Tiping biyax niya ka tubaraw giying, tubaraw giying pa mk4 kngkawas daw spuda mnangal burah Sng gikay ging, spuda ndanan seyngkyo tnualang umau pnspuwan. Keyngpo Netherlands pa muda pnwaya uri, hoying pusu ka suhwa cikwan u naqah pkla kari pnuda kwohuy mnuda ka hwaang smliq waya keyngpo. Qnita seyji sweycya pa Netherlands u mndungus bay pnqita mnduwa pprngaw mincu cngti Kngkawas 2010 Netherlands muda knbeyhing seyngkyo, Netherlands u muda gikay turuma giying seyngkyo. Babaw seyngkyo daw, Netherlands Kiristo Kyo Mincu Ryeynmong mi Mtrawah Mincu Jnmin Tang pssli phiyu kcka mquri narac ini khbaraw pay ryeynho seyhu, wada hbaraw bay Mtrawah Tang ka dmkuh snhiyi tonggi. Kngkawas 2010 idas 10 diyax 24, Mark Rutte ka psdhuwan phiyu sosyang mi lmutuc rmirih Jan Peter Balkenende, wada m92 kngkawas Netherlands muwaya bay Mtrawah Mincu Jnmin Tang na sosyang. Kngkawas 2012 cida tubrah knama mtalax ka ryeynho seyhu, knbeyhing seyngkyo u wada tubrah muda. Mniq snburah seyngkyo ka knbeyhing seyngkyo u, Mtrawah Mincu Jnmin Tang ka wada mangal 41 hiyi giying, Kong Tang u wada mangal 38 hiyi giying, babaw seyngkyo daw Mtrawah Mincu Jnmin Tang mi Kong Tang ka msupu pssli phiyu beyhing ryeynho seyhu. Jen-ko Netherlands ka qnlangan babaw dxral mitu knhbrawan sediq knbeyhing bay qnlhangan uri. Mitu niya knhbrawan hiyi sediq pa hmrinas 400 hiyi sediq/pinghwang km. Mniq Netherlands u niqan knou bay kluwanan minjoku sediq. Ana so kiya, mndungus bay dara sediq Netherlands u ida tnpusu balay knhbrawan hiyi sediq. 80.9% sediq Netherlands荷蘭人 2.4% sediq Indonesia印度尼西亞人 2.4% sediq Doicu德國人 2.2% sediq Turkey土耳其人 2.0% sediq Suriname蘇利南人 1.9% sediq Morocco摩洛哥人 0.8% mnNetherlands sediq Antilles mi sediq Aruba Kari Netherlands ka kari ddiyun seyhu Netherlands, mnIn O yusi Germanic kari joku truma na cida kari Germanic, kiya ka Netherlands, Belgium, Suriname mi mnNetherlands Antilles Cyutaw na kari seyhu. Mniq knkana dxral Antilles mi nniqan tudaya Belgium na Vlaanderen u malu ppwaluk pprngaw kana. O Co u ya bay niqan 2400 knbkiyan hiyi sediq dmuwi kari Netherlands ka ngalan dha tu1 kari, niqan uri ka mnqlhangan Netherlands 4 th na Indonesia u srngaw dha balay kddiyax uri. Spatas Kari Netherlands pa spuda 26 uxay daw 27 na bbtasun ji Rating pnspuwan, snpeyyah A dhuq Z, kiya mi mniq Y bukuy u niqan IJ. Kari Netherlands pa mncuwil dmuwi IJ rmirih Y. Kari Netherlands mi kari Ingkoku mi kari Doicu u msdalih hari, mntna mntuiwil cida kari Germanic kana. Kari Germanic ka snpeyyah rbuq dxral kari Doicu knou kluwan kari knpriyux niya, tumncbiyaw balay patas kari Netherlands u malu bhraun dhuq 12 th na Vlaanderen. Jiday cida u kari Netherlands ka pnspuwan 5 kluwanan kari: Kari Tukcka iwil (Kiya ka knkana Tuhunac, Tudaya Netherlands Sng, Utrecht Sng, Gelderland Sng na knou nniqan mi Sealand na tawyu hiya ka dmuwi kari niyi), Kari Tunarac Daya (Groningen, Drenthe, Baraw Esser mi Gelderland tunarac ka dmuwi kari niyi), Kari Tukcka Hunac (Tudaya Brabant mi ssiyaw dha nniqan Limburg, Belgium na Antwerp, Brabant mi Tunarac Vlaanderen), Kari Tuiwil Hunac (Tuiwil Vlaanderen) mi Kari Tunarac Hunac, Kari Tunarac Hunac u wada dha splawa Kari Tunarac Rbuq Dxral Frank, niqan 3 pnsliyan daw wada dha splawa Kari Tuiwil Rbuq Dxrak Frank. Netherlands na kari Friesland pa wada ngalan kingal kluwanan kari: Kari Friesland. Kari Tuhunac Afrika, splawa dha 'KariTuhunac Afrika Netherlands', kiya ka 17 th mpqlahang niya rmnngaw kari Netherlands na knpriyux kari, niqan knou bay kari Malay, kari Bantu na knbarux kari mi dduwi kari ka wisu mrimax kcka hiya, hangan kluwan pusu rudan cbiyaw sediq bhuway Tuhunac Afrika ka sediq Boer, kiya mi pusu pnyahan kari niyi u snpeyyah kari Netherlands na boer (sediq mpqpah pnwalang) kari niyi. Kingal Dungan tu1 kari icil Netherlands ka kari Ingkoku, pnkla kari seyhu u niqan 95%－98% knhbrawan hiyi sediq ka wana mkla rmngaw kari Ingkoku. Bungka Yisu Netherlands mntuting hbaraw hiyi niqan bay hnhangan mpjuga sediq. Tudaya Pkrana Wenyi Jiday cida daw tna niqan pcriyu ka mnbrah balay Netherlands juga pay. 17 th cida, mnbiyax bay cida ka Netherlands Konghkwo u pcriyu ka Netherlands king jiday juga, Netherlands pcriyu ka Rembrandt Harmenszoon Van Rijn, Johannes Vermeer, Jan Havickszoon Steen mi duma mpjuga sediq. 19 th mi 20 th mpjuga sediq u kiya ka knkana Van Gogh mi Piet Cornelies Mondrian. Kiya mi Maurits Cornelis Escher u taxa niqan balay hnhangan tusing yisucya. Coswey mi wenswey Cosweycya Netherlands u kiya ka knkana Desiderius Erasmus mi Baruch de Spinoza. Cosweycya France Descartes pusu bnatas niya u mntna mnhdu matas hini cida uri. Mniq 'King Kngkawas Cida', Netherlands wenswey u mn10 mrana balay uri, wada mtutuy ka Joost Van Den Vondel mi Pieter Corneliszoon Hooft ddha hiyi nniqan bay hangan mpbatas. 20 th pusu balay mpbatas niya ka Harry Kurt Victor Mulisch, Jan Wolkers, Simon Vestdijk, Cees Nooteboom, Gerard Reve mi Willem Frederik Hermans. Tiyu Mntna balay qnlhangan O Co uri, mtur boru ka tu1 undo Netherlands, Netherlands Qnlhangan Mtur Boru Tuy ka O Co 1 seyng mbiyax na balay mpsburu niya, niqan 'Mmudu Rakkaw Lukus Pngtwan' mi 'Bukung Uka Nngalan' ka hangan splawa dha, mn3 mnangal Qnlangan Pey tu2 bang, kiya u mniq kngkawas 1988 Netherlands 3 cyeynko cida mangal O Co Qnlhangan Pey tu1ci bang. Netherlands cida uri u mntutuy ka hbaraw balay niqan hnhangan mpbtur boru niya. Pangcyo mniq tndxral dha Netherlands u ana ini so khbaraw ka qmita niya, binaw mniq mndxral dha nganguc Curacao mi Aruba ka mrana balay, Netherlands pangcyo taypyawtuy u knttu mniq knbeyhing qnlangan pnsung boru mangal snadu, kiya ka O Co niqan ka ririh dha mbiyax bay mpcbu boru. Kngkarac Snlhayan snhiyan Netherlands u snbeyhing mita mtrawah snlhayan snhiyan. Saya pquri so O Co qnlhangan icil pa, Netherlands ka O Co saya mnbabaw dxral balay na qnlhangan uri, 67.8% knhbrawan hiyi sediq ka uka snlhayan snhiyan, uxay daw ini tumal uuda psliyan snlhayan. Netherlands pusu balay snlhayan u kiya ka knkana Teyngs kyo (24.6%) mi Kiristo kyo burah kyokay (10.8). Singjya Tengs kyo pa pusu balay u wa mniq tuhunac nniqan, kiya mi Kiristo kyo burah kyokay u, pusu balay ka Netherlands Kweycng Kyokay, mnCalvin cyawpay, rikisi cbiyaw u mntxtaxa sediq snhiyi han, saya daw wada mlih da. Kiya uri u alaw hbaraw ka sediq tnhdilan Muslim, wada dhuq knkana knhbrawan hiyi sediq qnlhangan 5%, kiya ka wada tu3 knbeyhing snlhayan snhiyan Netherlands ka Muslim. Kiya mi, Netherlands u niqan hbaraw sinjya Bu kyo, Yodaya kyo mi India kyo uri ka Netherlands. Mssruwa na syakay hungci Netherlands u niqan bay hnhangan dha syakay hungci mssruwa ptrawah balay qcahur dha. Kiya uri u, Netherlands u dhuq pnluban lmngelung mawyi, phpah yucinsyang, rulu bwihur, kucu qhuni, weluq miruku mi bhuway tmkarac rakaw cayyo tawci uri ppwaluk. Mniq kngkawas 2001 idas 4 diyax 1, Netherlands u wada mtu1 qnlangan smruwa pnwaya tongsing msturung na qnlhangan. Mniq kngkawas 2002 idas 4 diyax 1, Netherlands pa wada mntu1 qnlangan smruwa pnwaya Anre Mhuqil na qnlhangan. Kiya mi Netherlands u mquri so dama mi uxay kasi qhuqil na doku, singcyawyi mi mangal laqi nbuyas na horicu mniq qnlangan u kiya ka kntrawah balay kiya. Netherlands snblayaq balay qmita quri so sediq tnldilan na qnlhangan, niqan hbaraw balay sediq Netherlands uri ka thdil qnlhangan icil. Cing-ci Kongyey Mrana balay ka kongyey Netherlands, pusu balay kongyey pumn u niqan uuqun cyakong, gasoring cyakong, kmari king, smalu kikay, tyeyncu, xxiluy, smalu asu, insacu, tqliwaq btunux cyakong uri. Rotterdam ka O Co knbeyhing balay smluwan gasoring congsin. Netherlands u niqan ou balay niqan hnhangan kojyo hmqangaw qnlhangan, kngkawas 2011 u niqan 12 Netherlands ciyey mtmay 'QNLANGAN 500 Mbiyax'. Mray so: Netherlands Hwangcya Shell Citwan (Spuda Netherlands Hwangcya Gasoring Kojyo mi Ingkoku Shell Mphaqun mi Mawyi Kojyo mniq kngkawas 1907 wada mnsupu, kiya ka qnlangan knbeyhing balay kongyey kojyo uri, wada mbiyax mniq qnlangan 500 ciyey tu2 bang, kiya mi gasoring mi suhwa jnryaw na tu2 bang biyax dha pnyahan mi pbari, kiya ka qnlangan tu2 knbeyhing gasoring kojyo); Philips tyeyncu kojyo (pnhiyu kngkawas 1891, mniq qnlangan 500 mbiyax ciyey tu277 bnkuwan, mniq kcka qnlangan tyeyncu ciyey tnbkuwan tubrah 10 bang. Quri so camaaw pkrdax, kluwan rakaw syeynsyangkwan, teyntong ssaqic ngudus, X rdax hunsiyi mi pradiyo sepey mniq mntna qqpahan niya pa ida mniq brah ka hnyuwan dha); Ryeynho Rihwa kojyo (pnhiyu kngkawas 1930, mniq qnlangan 500 mbiyax ciyey kcka u tu136 tbnkuwan, kiya ka qnlhangan knbeyhing balay ddiyun kddiyax mi uuqun sngcan ciyey uri, psuwan Rotterdam mi London ddha congpu), Netherlands u seykining ppeyyah uuqun, Ingkoku ka seykining ppeyyah qqiya ddiyun kddiyax); Aksu Nobel Kojyo (nniqan bay hnhangan qnlangan hwakong mi qqpahun iyu, kngkawas 1994 snpeyyah Netherlands Aksu kojyo mi Sweden Nobel kojyo pnspuwan kiya, mniq qnlangan 500 mbiyax ciyey u tbkuwan 479). Qpahan pnwalang Netherlands ka kcka qnlhangan qqpahan pnwalang mrana balay qnlhangan uri, nngalan knkana kcka qnlhangan 2% ka qqpahan pnwalang u, kiya ka qnlangan pusu balay pnyahan qqpahan pnwalang qnlhangan uri. Pnspuwan kcka qqpahan pnwalang u, qqpahan tmabu tnbuwan ka 50%, qqpahan pphpah mi qqhuni ka 38%, qqpahan phuma ka 12%. Kngkawas 2005 cida Netherlands u mnsmlanan pnyahan pnwalang mi uuqun cuko nngalan pila u 789.3 oku pila Amirika na ndanan dha. Netherlands u pdkanan taxa sediq u niqan 1/10 dapa, 1 babuy, mniq qqpahan tmabu tnbuwan wada mtrawah qnlhangan hangryey. Dxral qnlhangan Netherlands u wana balay 41500 pinghwang km, binaw knkana qnlhangan u niqan 110 pinghwang km ka ngalan dha wensu phuma pphpah mi hiyi pnwalang mi sama, so kiya wada mangal 'O Co Nniqan Phpah' ka knmalu hangan dha. Pphpah ka pusu balay qqpahan pnyahan dmkuh Netherlands, tnkawas cuko dhuq 100 oku pila O weyn, cuko ryang u knkana kwoci sucang 60%. Netherlands ka pnyahan qnlangan weluq miriku knbeyhing balay qnlhangan, qnlangan babaw dxral knnama balay phiyu Hawta Weluq Miruku Cyawyi Congsin nniqan balay hnhangan dha uri, diyax ndan dha u wada niqan 300 kngkawas qnbsyaqan da. Kiya uri u, Netherlands ka pusu balay qnlhangan pyahan phuma bunga tumun uri. Ppanan rulu Ppanan asu mi rulu Netherlands pa mndungus balay. Elu yayung kcka qnlhangan mndungus balay, elu asu u ppwaluk mi mndungus balay uri. Mquri tuhunac pyahan Ucilung Daya ka Yayung Rhine ka mtbiyax balay yayung knkana qnlangan ppanan asu uri. Kiya mi rhngun yayung ka Rotterdam ka knkana qnlangan knbeyhing balay tdruwan asu, twenturyang u mn42 kngkawas knkana qnlangan tu1ci bang. Ppanan skoki Amsterdam ka pusu balay ppanan skoki O Co, mnou balay wada mangal hangan knmalu balay ppanan skoki knkana qnlangan. Mdhu balay lnlungan dha qqlahang lnglingay dxral ka Netherlands, txtaxa sediq jncyun u niqan 2 ddeyngsya, ddeyngsya ka pusu balay ppanan dha, alang mkbrnux u wada smluwan lxanan balay elu ddaun ddeyngsya. Huwuyey Snpeyyah 20 th 80 kngkkawas dhuq saya, huwuyey ka wada ini biyaw mrana, wada mpusu balay stmanan keyjay sediq qnlhangan Netherlands. Pusu balay qqpahan pnyahan ka ppanan, ginghang, pawsyeyn, kusu, rryawan mi uuqan mi mmahan. N=Niqan ou nniqan bay hnhangan ginghang mi cinjong ciko ka Netherlands. Mray so : Netherlands Ginghang (Snpeyyah Netherlands Tongyong Ginghang mi Amsterdam-Rotterdam Ginghang mnniq kngkawas 1991 pnspuwan dha, mniq knkana qnlangan u niqan 3000 sngari cida ciko niya, kiya ka knkana qnlangan niqan ginghang wangrwo knou balay uri. Ginghang tnbkuwan O Co u wa mniq tubrah 10, qnlhangan u wa mniq tubrah20); Netherlands Kwoci Citwan (kiya ka ING, snpeyyah Netherlands congcang- Yobing Citwan mi Netherlands Kwomin Jnso Pawsyeyn Kojyo mniq kngkawas 1991 pnspuwan dha. Kiya ka tu1 knbeyhing balay cinjong ciko, mniq kngkawas 2011 kcka Knkana Qnlangan 500 Mbiyax Ciyey u tu17 tnbkuwan niya); Netherlands Qqpahan Pnwalang Hcwo Ginghang (Spuda Netherlands ou balay nongcwen sinyongso mniq kngkawas 1973 pnspuwan dha, kiya ka Netherlands tu2 knbeyhing ginghang, mniq knkana qnlangan u tu50 mbiyax niya). Qqpahan mpriwaw Niqan 'O Co Nniqan Pphpah' mi 'Qnlhangan Rulu Bwihur' sunca dha lmawa ka Netherlands, qqpahan rmiwaw u mrana balay, niqan balay hnhangan ka qnepah dha hmtur ucilung smmalu elu, malu balay qtan ka pnhmanan cyu pphpah yucinsyang (Netherlands u niqan 'Yucinsyang Wangkwo' sunca hangan dha, yucinsyang ka phpah qnlhangan dha), nniqan bay hangan ka weluq miriku alang mkbrnux tiping Hawta (niqan knkana qnlangan tu1 weluq miruku cyawyi congsin), htngayan balay ncbiyaw hngakan ka knbeyhing bay rrulu bwihur (Netherlands ka ou bay rulu bwihur na qnlhangan) kiya ka malu balay sanan sdmhaw rmiwaw kana. Mquri nganguc mawyi Netherlands pa kndadax cbiyaw daw ida kiya mawyi mbiyax balay qnlhangan, mniq 17 th tubrah cida niqan 'Macohu Ucilung' sunca dha tmhangan, sotu Amsterdam mniq cida ka hniwan niya u mntna balay so New York saya. Ana dhuq saya, Netherlands uquri so mquri nganguc mawyi pa ida mniq dmudul balay knkana qnlangan, Netherlands ka msnul bukuy Amirika mi France na knkana qnlangan tu3 pnyahan pnwalang cuko qnlhangan. Pusu balay cinko Netherlands ka kongyey weyryaw, weynyo gasoring, pancngpin mi kikay uri. 60% na pnyahan ka ngalaan cuko, pusu balay ka smnalu gasoring, tyeyncu canpin, asu mi pnyahan pnwalang uri.

= Netherlands = Gaga kska Owcow ka Netherlands, 52 30 N, 5 45 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 41,543 sq km(hangan na o Tg135) (knlbanga dxgal o 33,893 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 7,650 sq km). Kana ka sejiqon o niqan 17,016,967 hiyi. Gaga Amsterdam ka poso alang paro, jiyax 27 idas 4 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Mano ka dxgal Netherlands ga wada sogan 55.10% ka dxgal qpahan, 10.80% ka dxgal bboyo, rahoq dxgal do niqan 34.10% na. Bokong klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Willem-Alexander, pnaah hngkawas2013 idas 4 jiyax 30pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Ri-s Ini qlhangi Roma Tikwo brah cida ka Netherlands han pa, niqan ka qnbhangan kari sediq Kyle mi sediq Germanic ka mnniq hini. Qnlhangan Moma Tikwo jiday na Netherlands (BC. Kngkawas 55-410) Mniq mncbiyaw Roma jiday, nniqan Yayong Rhine brah o 'mnBelgiom Gaol' Sng han, hiti daw wada 'mnGermanic Sing Sng'. Nniqan todaya o niqan hbaraw bay alang Germanic ka mniq hiyi, tohonac ka sediq Gaol, kiya mi dsediq Gaol niyi o mniq thdil cida o wada pspowan oo bay alang Germanic ori, kcka niya sediq Salion Frank o snpeyyah hini wada thdil Gaol, kiya mi mniq kongweyn 5 th wada phiyo kiya ka mbiyax na balay Merlot Wangcaw . Habsborg jiday na Netherlands (Kngkawas 1519-1581) Tokcka th, qnlhangan mniq dxral rrboq (To bay knkana nniqan Netherlands, nniqan toiwil Doico, Loxemboorg, Belgiom, doma nniqan todaya France) mnniqan oo balay coho fongcyeyn tndxral, psnakan mnBoorgogne mi Snprowan Balay Roma Tikwo. Dhoq 16 th bhah cida, alaw mrrimax na hwangso mstorong, dhiya o mniq kcka snprowan Roma Tikwo Habsborg Wangcaw cida wada pskngalan. Kngkawas 1556 tikwo hwangti Charlie 5 th (Kngkawas 1519-1556 ngalan bokong) malix bokong, wada niya psowan laqi niya Philip 2 th ka Spain mi rrboq dxrasl (Wada splawa Todaya Sng), wada niya sobway swayi na Ferdinand ka Aostria mi doma nniqan mi Habsborg Wangcaw cngtong. So kiya, Todaya Nniqan Sng o mnSpain Wangkwo. Netherlands 7 Sng Konghkwo Jiday (Kngkawas 1581-1795) Kngkawas 1568, alaw knciyok Spain Wangkwo congyang cicweyn mi tmraqil Kiristokyo Borah Kyokay Calvin Pay, psporoq Todaya Sng knciyok Spain mccbo 80 kngkawas. Kngkawas 1579 Todaya Sng kcka 7 Sng (nniqan dxral Netherland, Belgioom mi Loxemboorg saya) wada phiyo Utrecht Tongmong, msopo moda knciyok qlhangan Spain. Niyi o kiya ka prading ngalan Netherlands saya. Kngkawas 1581, ryeynmong o mndongos bay pkla kari dokorico. Lmotoc ka mccbo, dhoq kngkawas 1648 bokong qnlhangan Spain Philip 4 th ka hana psdho pbatas "Patas Pnsdhowan Monster", smrowa 7 dxral rboq (Netherlands)/ 7 Sng Ryeynho Konghkwo, speyyah Spain mangal dokorico daw, Netherlands o wada pkrana mo17 th mtnocilong mi mawyi mbiyax qnlhangan. Netherlands o mniq qnlangan knkingal dxral phiyo qlhangan mi nniqan mawyi, kiya ka knkana doma nniqan Taiwan pa mniq kngkawas 1624 dhoq kngkawas 1662 mi kngkawas 1664 dhoq kngkawas 1667 cida pa mndxral qlhangan Netherlands ori. Diyax iyax niyi pa mniq Netherlands o ngalan dha diyax 'King Jiday'. Kndadax prading dhoq hiti o wada ptrawah mi qmlahang 4 dxral nniqan, kiya ka New Yook, Tohonac Afrika, Indonesia mi Taiwan. 17 th thiti daw, Netherlands pa brah mi bokoy o mnccbo Ingkoko mi France, mniq ocilong o wada ini baka Ingkoko ko ka Netherlands (Mccbo Ingkoko mi Netherlands), mniq dxral o wada ini baka France ka Netherlands (Mccbo France mi Netherlands), kndadax hiya daw kiya ka wada kndodol mtoting ka biyax dha da. Kngkawas 1740 (Kngkawas Cing Cyeynrong 5) idas 10 diyax 9-12, mnniq Java Batawiya (wa mniq Indonesia Java Taw Jakarta saya) psporoq sediq Netherlands phoqil Hwajn tnhdilan na Hongsi Canan, Hwajn o hmrinas knbkiyan hiyi ka wada mhoqil. Wada olkan knrmox France jiday (Kngkawas 1795-1814) Kngkawas 1795 cida wada olkan knrmox France Tikwo ka Netherlands, Napoleon brah mi bokoy pa mniq hini moda dmodol Batawiya Konghkwo mi Netherlands Wangkwo. Netherlands Wangkwo Jiday (Kngkawas 1815-1940) Wada mnhdo qnlhangan Napoleon kngkawas 1815 cida ka Franse daw, Netherlands mi Belgiom saya, Loxemboorg saya o wada msopo pnsliyan Netherlands Wangkwo. Belgiom o wada ini biyaw mniq kngkawas 1830 dokorico, Loxemboorg ori o wada msnol dokorico ori, tndxral Netherlands o wada nanaq lmotoc Netherlands Wangkwo. Tomndha Knbeyhing Mccbo Qnlangan (Kngkawas 1940-1945) Netherlands mniq kcka Tomn1 Knbeyhing Mccbo Qnlangan pa moda congri kiya. Netherlands o mniq kcka Tomn2 Knbeyhing Mccbo Qnlangan kndadax kngkawas 1940 idas 5 cida wada yahan olkan knrmox Doico, dhoq kngkawas 1945 cida o hana wada plaxan qmlahang. Babaw mnhdo mnccbo jiday (Kngkawas 1945 dhoq saya) Babaw mnccbo daw, wada mntxan mtotoy mi mdakil mkrana ka keyjay Netherlands Dongan. Netherlands ka B (Belgiom), Ho (Netherlands), L (Loxemboorg) na mnsopo tomal Keyjay Ryeynmong, O Co Keyjay Kongtongti mi Todaya Pnsdhowan niya. Mniq kngkawas 1945 idas 12 diyax 15, Netherlands o wada dha pdaon ka "Patas Pnsdhowan Netherlands Wangkwo" (Het Statoot), kiya ida nanaq dxral qlhangan Netherlands mi mndxral dha pa mniq kcka wangkwo mi tndxral Netherlands o niqan mntna hniwan dha kana. Snpeyyah hiya cida Netherlands Wangkwo o tmiyo tndxral Netherlands mi pnsliyan doma brah qmnlhangan dxral na wangkwo, kiya mi 'Netherlands' o wana nanaq tmiyo O Co Talo Netherlands. Netherlands Wangkwo saya o niqan 4 nniqan dxral, kiya ka O Co Talo Netherlands, Aroba, Coracao mi mnNetherlands Martin, kiya mi Hanajima, Sint Eostatios Taw mi mn Netherlands Sabah Taw o wada pspowan tndxral Netherlands mi wada ngalan tokobeyco singcngcyo kiya da. Ti-ri O Co cyo Netherlands Mbrnox ka lnlingay dxral Netherlands tokobeyco na balay. Tndxral qnlhangan dha pa hmrinas dmka o ini khrinas 1m ka haypa niya, 26% dxral o ini knrinas knbaraw ocilong. Doma nniqan o spoda qnriyan ocilong mi wada smlowan dxral nniqan, mray so nniqan knkana dxral Flevoland Sng. Rrboq dxral niyi o to wada smlowan qnalang sbangan ocilong kana moda qmlahang nniqan dha. Kiya mi sediq Netherlands o kndadax cbiyaw dhoq saya mpplok dxral ocilong, qnita dha sediq Netherlands pa knbeyhing balay payis dha ka ocilong. Knbaraw bay dxral O Co cyo Netherlands pa kiya ka wa mniq qnlhangan dha tonarac honac balay na Dwiyaq Vals, hapa 321m, binaw knkana balay Netherlands tobaraw balay ka wa mniq Ucilong Caribean Sabah Taw na Ddwiyaq Landscape, knbaraw niya o 887m, hini o kiya ka knbaraw na balay knkana Netherlands Wangkwo ori. Yayong Rhine, Yayong Val mi Yayong Mas o wada dha psdkanan m2 ka Netherlands. Rngecox qsiya Kndadax cbiyaw, alaw qnrqilan ida nkiya mi tomal ka ssediq, Netherlands na ayos mkngalo ocilong o ida ini sangay knpriyox. Niqan bay hnhangan ka ndanan kngkawas 1134 knbeyhing bwihor, wada sqrboq bongan kcka ocilong ka knoo bay dxral dha, kiya ka smnlanan ka Zeeland Sng toiwil honac na cyotaw. Kngkawas 1278 idas 12 diyax 14 cida, Qnrqilan Rngecox Saint Locia o wada niqan hmrinas 5 knbkiyan hiyi sediq ka mrdang Netherlands mi Doico, kiya ndanan rikisi Netherlands knchdil balay mn1 qnrqilan rngecox ori. Kngkawas 1421 Rngecox Qnrqilan Sng Elisabeth daw, wada smliq knoo bay dxral qnpahan, niqan 72 pinghwang km na Biesbosch cawsi rngecox mbrnox ka pcriyo. Kngkawas 1953 idas 2, Ucilong Todaya o yahan rngecox qsiya, wada sliqan rngecox ka knoo balay sbangan ocilong toiwil honac Netherlands, niqan hmrinas 1,800 hiyi sediq ka wada dson rngecox mi mrdang. So kiya o seyho Netherlands ka moda keykako knbeyhing bay qndahang rrngecox, kiya ka moda qmlahang qnlhangan dha so ini yahi knrmox rrngecox, kcka niqan bay hnhangan niya ka Toro Hongon Co kongcng. Kngkarac O Co cyo Netherlands yopan balaybwihor snpeyyah Acores kawya bwihor toiwil honac, kngkarac mnMtilox Hari Hayyangsing, misan ka moxol mi mtlto ka rbawan, qnyoxan qsiya tnkawas o 650-700 hwami. Binaw Ucilong Caribbean na Bonaire o kngkarac mnMtilox Dmka Kndngowan; Sabah mi Sng Eostatios ka nniqan mtilox mi mhoriq. Netherlands Caribbean Cyo Netherlands Caribbean Cyo ka 3 tndxral tokobeyco singcngcyo: Bonaire Taw, Sng Eostatios Taw mi mnNetherlands Sabah Taw na pnspowan hangan, splawa dha BES tawyo ori. Singcng cyohwa Nniqan O Co Netherlands pa psnakan 12 Sng:荷蘭分為12個省: Groningen Sng- Tonarac daya, Sng hoy ka Groningen. 格羅寧根省— Friesland Sng- Todaya, Sng hoy ka Revaden. 菲士蘭省—北部,省會是雷瓦登 Drenthe Sng- Tonarac daya, tohonac Groningen, Sng hoy ka Assen. 德倫特省— Baraw Esser- Tonarac, tohonac Drenthe, Sng hoy ka Zwolle. 上愛塞省— Flevoland Sng- Tokckas, Ijsselmeer, Sng hoy ka Lelystad. 夫利佛蘭省— Gelderland Sng- Tonarac, tohonac Baraw Esser, Sng hoy ka Arnhem. Utrecht Sng- Tokcka, Sng hoy ka Utrecht. 烏特勒支省—中部,省會是烏特勒支 Todaya Netherlands Sng- Toiwil daya, Sng hoy ka Hallam. Tohonac Netherlands Sng- Tokcka mqoro toiwil, Sng hoy ka Hagoe. Zeeland Sng- Toiwil honac, Sng hoy ka Middelborg. Todaya Brabant Sng- Tohonac, Sng hoy ka Shertogenbosch. Limborg Sng- Tonarac honac, lmotoc dhoq Belgiom, Sng hoy ka Mestreech. . Trahoc Sng o phiyo So Cn (gemeenten), sani mita ka seyji So Cn Netherlands. 省下設市鎮(gemeenten),參見荷蘭市鎮政治. Nniqan Ucilongc Caribbean Seyji Cngtang Kndadax kngkawas 1581 dhoq kngkawas 1806, Netherlands ka kongh tico, binaw oxay pnwaya gikay minco qnlhangan. Babar niya kngkawas 1806 dhoq kngkawas 1815, wada dan tnayis qmlahang France ka Netherlands. Kndadax kngkawas 1815 prading, Netherlands ida nanaq pnwaya bongkong phiyo keyngpo na qnlhangan. Snpeyyah kngkawas 2013, bokong qnlhangan William Alexander ka moda psdho phyowan weynso qnlhangan dhoq saya. Balay balay mndongos kari pa, bokong qnlhangan o niqan biyax psdho phiyo pnspowan mpqpah seyho. Balay bay o spoda ndanan seyngkyo phiyo ryeynho seyho, kiya daw spoda bokong qnlhangan ka moda pkla kari ooda psdho poso tonox seyho. Netherlands gikay o pnspowan toroma giying (To2 ying) mi tobaraw (to1 ying). 150 hiyi gying ka pnspowan toroma giying, mk4 kngkawas moda seyngkyo mn1, malo mtbrah knpriyox seyngkyo ori, kiya o pnwaya seyngkyo o pnwaya piri dayhyo. Alaw hbaraw ka cngtang toroma giying, so kiya seyngkyo daw oka brahan spoda morox taxa cngtang ka malo pssli seyho, so kiya daw moda pssli seyho iyax niya o ya bay mosa mkpiya idas hari, binaw ryeynho seyho o kasi ka mniq toroma giying mangal knhbrawan ging ka smrowah dmkoh, binaw ana ini angal knhbrawan hiyi giying tobaraw giying ka smrowa dmkoh. Tiping biyax niya ka tobaraw giying, tobaraw giying pa mk4 kngkawas daw spoda mnangal borah Sng gikay ging, spoda ndanan seyngkyo tnoalang omao pnspowan. Keyngpo Netherlands pa moda pnwaya ori, hoying poso ka sohwa cikwan o naqah pkla kari pnoda kwohoy mnoda ka hwaang smliq waya keyngpo. Qnita seyji sweycya pa Netherlands o mndongos bay pnqita mndowa pprngaw minco cngti Kngkawas 2010 Netherlands moda knbeyhing seyngkyo, Netherlands o moda gikay toroma giying seyngkyo. Babaw seyngkyo daw, Netherlands Kiristo Kyo Minco Ryeynmong mi Mtrawah Minco Jnmin Tang pssli phiyo kcka mqori narac ini khbaraw pay ryeynho seyho, wada hbaraw bay Mtrawah Tang ka dmkoh snhiyi tonggi. Kngkawas 2010 idas 10 diyax 24, Mark Rotte ka psdhowan phiyo sosyang mi lmotoc rmirih Jan Peter Balkenende, wada m92 kngkawas Netherlands mowaya bay Mtrawah Minco Jnmin Tang na sosyang. Kngkawas 2012 cida tobrah knama mtalax ka ryeynho seyho, knbeyhing seyngkyo o wada tobrah moda. Mniq snborah seyngkyo ka knbeyhing seyngkyo o, Mtrawah Minco Jnmin Tang ka wada mangal 41 hiyi giying, Kong Tang o wada mangal 38 hiyi giying, babaw seyngkyo daw Mtrawah Minco Jnmin Tang mi Kong Tang ka msopo pssli phiyo beyhing ryeynho seyho. Jen-ko Netherlands ka qnlangan babaw dxral mito knhbrawan sediq knbeyhing bay qnlhangan ori. Mito niya knhbrawan hiyi sediq pa hmrinas 400 hiyi sediq/pinghwang km. Mniq Netherlands o niqan knoo bay klowanan minjoko sediq. Ana so kiya, mndongos bay dara sediq Netherlands o ida tnposo balay knhbrawan hiyi sediq. 80.9% sediq Netherlands荷蘭人 2.4% sediq Indonesia印度尼西亞人 2.4% sediq Doico德國人 2.2% sediq Torkey土耳其人 2.0% sediq Soriname蘇利南人 1.9% sediq Morocco摩洛哥人 0.8% mnNetherlands sediq Antilles mi sediq Aroba Kari Netherlands ka kari ddiyon seyho Netherlands, mnIn O yosi Germanic kari joko troma na cida kari Germanic, kiya ka Netherlands, Belgiom, Soriname mi mnNetherlands Antilles Cyotaw na kari seyho. Mniq knkana dxral Antilles mi nniqan todaya Belgiom na Vlaanderen o malo ppwalok pprngaw kana. O Co o ya bay niqan 2400 knbkiyan hiyi sediq dmowi kari Netherlands ka ngalan dha to1 kari, niqan ori ka mnqlhangan Netherlands 4 th na Indonesia o srngaw dha balay kddiyax ori. Spatas Kari Netherlands pa spoda 26 oxay daw 27 na bbtason ji Rating pnspowan, snpeyyah A dhoq Z, kiya mi mniq Y bokoy o niqan IJ. Kari Netherlands pa mncowil dmowi IJ rmirih Y. Kari Netherlands mi kari Ingkoko mi kari Doico o msdalih hari, mntna mntoiwil cida kari Germanic kana. Kari Germanic ka snpeyyah rboq dxral kari Doico knoo klowan kari knpriyox niya, tomncbiyaw balay patas kari Netherlands o malo bhraon dhoq 12 th na Vlaanderen. Jiday cida o kari Netherlands ka pnspowan 5 klowanan kari: Kari Tokcka iwil (Kiya ka knkana Tohonac, Todaya Netherlands Sng, Utrecht Sng, Gelderland Sng na knoo nniqan mi Sealand na tawyo hiya ka dmowi kari niyi), Kari Tonarac Daya (Groningen, Drenthe, Baraw Esser mi Gelderland tonarac ka dmowi kari niyi), Kari Tokcka Honac (Todaya Brabant mi ssiyaw dha nniqan Limborg, Belgiom na Antwerp, Brabant mi Tonarac Vlaanderen), Kari Toiwil Honac (Toiwil Vlaanderen) mi Kari Tonarac Honac, Kari Tonarac Honac o wada dha splawa Kari Tonarac Rboq Dxral Frank, niqan 3 pnsliyan daw wada dha splawa Kari Toiwil Rboq Dxrak Frank. Netherlands na kari Friesland pa wada ngalan kingal klowanan kari: Kari Friesland. Kari Tohonac Afrika, splawa dha 'KariTohonac Afrika Netherlands', kiya ka 17 th mpqlahang niya rmnngaw kari Netherlands na knpriyox kari, niqan knoo bay kari Malay, kari Banto na knbarox kari mi ddowi kari ka wiso mrimax kcka hiya, hangan klowan poso rodan cbiyaw sediq bhoway Tohonac Afrika ka sediq Boer, kiya mi poso pnyahan kari niyi o snpeyyah kari Netherlands na boer (sediq mpqpah pnwalang) kari niyi. Kingal Dongan to1 kari icil Netherlands ka kari Ingkoko, pnkla kari seyho o niqan 95%－98% knhbrawan hiyi sediq ka wana mkla rmngaw kari Ingkoko. Bongka Yiso Netherlands mntoting hbaraw hiyi niqan bay hnhangan mpjoga sediq. Todaya Pkrana Wenyi Jiday cida daw tna niqan pcriyo ka mnbrah balay Netherlands joga pay. 17 th cida, mnbiyax bay cida ka Netherlands Konghkwo o pcriyo ka Netherlands king jiday joga, Netherlands pcriyo ka Rembrandt Harmenszoon Van Rijn, Johannes Vermeer, Jan Havickszoon Steen mi doma mpjoga sediq. 19 th mi 20 th mpjoga sediq o kiya ka knkana Van Gogh mi Piet Cornelies Mondrian. Kiya mi Maorits Cornelis Escher o taxa niqan balay hnhangan tosing yisocya. Coswey mi wenswey Cosweycya Netherlands o kiya ka knkana Desiderios Erasmos mi Baroch de Spinoza. Cosweycya France Descartes poso bnatas niya o mntna mnhdo matas hini cida ori. Mniq 'King Kngkawas Cida', Netherlands wenswey o mn10 mrana balay ori, wada mtotoy ka Joost Van Den Vondel mi Pieter Corneliszoon Hooft ddha hiyi nniqan bay hangan mpbatas. 20 th poso balay mpbatas niya ka Harry Kort Victor Molisch, Jan Wolkers, Simon Vestdijk, Cees Nooteboom, Gerard Reve mi Willem Frederik Hermans. Tiyo Mntna balay qnlhangan O Co ori, mtor boro ka to1 ondo Netherlands, Netherlands Qnlhangan Mtor Boro Toy ka O Co 1 seyng mbiyax na balay mpsboro niya, niqan 'Mmodo Rakkaw Lokos Pngtwan' mi 'Bokong Uka Nngalan' ka hangan splawa dha, mn3 mnangal Qnlangan Pey to2 bang, kiya o mniq kngkawas 1988 Netherlands 3 cyeynko cida mangal O Co Qnlhangan Pey to1ci bang. Netherlands cida ori o mntotoy ka hbaraw balay niqan hnhangan mpbtor boro niya. Pangcyo mniq tndxral dha Netherlands o ana ini so khbaraw ka qmita niya, binaw mniq mndxral dha ngangoc Coracao mi Aroba ka mrana balay, Netherlands pangcyo taypyawtoy o kntto mniq knbeyhing qnlangan pnsong boro mangal snado, kiya ka O Co niqan ka ririh dha mbiyax bay mpcbo boro. Kngkarac Snlhayan snhiyan Netherlands o snbeyhing mita mtrawah snlhayan snhiyan. Saya pqori so O Co qnlhangan icil pa, Netherlands ka O Co saya mnbabaw dxral balay na qnlhangan ori, 67.8% knhbrawan hiyi sediq ka oka snlhayan snhiyan, oxay daw ini tomal ooda psliyan snlhayan. Netherlands poso balay snlhayan o kiya ka knkana Teyngs kyo (24.6%) mi Kiristo kyo borah kyokay (10.8). Singjya Tengs kyo pa poso balay o wa mniq tohonac nniqan, kiya mi Kiristo kyo borah kyokay o, poso balay ka Netherlands Kweycng Kyokay, mnCalvin cyawpay, rikisi cbiyaw o mntxtaxa sediq snhiyi han, saya daw wada mlih da. Kiya ori o alaw hbaraw ka sediq tnhdilan Moslim, wada dhoq knkana knhbrawan hiyi sediq qnlhangan 5%, kiya ka wada to3 knbeyhing snlhayan snhiyan Netherlands ka Moslim. Kiya mi, Netherlands o niqan hbaraw sinjya Bo kyo, Yodaya kyo mi India kyo ori ka Netherlands. Mssrowa na syakay hongci Netherlands o niqan bay hnhangan dha syakay hongci mssrowa ptrawah balay qcahor dha. Kiya ori o, Netherlands o dhoq pnloban lmngelong mawyi, phpah yocinsyang, rolo bwihor, koco qhoni, weloq miroko mi bhoway tmkarac rakaw cayyo tawci ori ppwalok. Mniq kngkawas 2001 idas 4 diyax 1, Netherlands o wada mto1 qnlangan smrowa pnwaya tongsing mstorong na qnlhangan. Mniq kngkawas 2002 idas 4 diyax 1, Netherlands pa wada mnto1 qnlangan smrowa pnwaya Anre Mhoqil na qnlhangan. Kiya mi Netherlands o mqori so dama mi oxay kasi qhoqil na doko, singcyawyi mi mangal laqi nboyas na horico mniq qnlangan o kiya ka kntrawah balay kiya. Netherlands snblayaq balay qmita qori so sediq tnldilan na qnlhangan, niqan hbaraw balay sediq Netherlands ori ka thdil qnlhangan icil. Cing-ci Kongyey Mrana balay ka kongyey Netherlands, poso balay kongyey pomn o niqan ooqon cyakong, gasoring cyakong, kmari king, smalo kikay, tyeynco, xxiloy, smalo aso, insaco, tqliwaq btonox cyakong ori. Rotterdam ka O Co knbeyhing balay smlowan gasoring congsin. Netherlands o niqan oo balay niqan hnhangan kojyo hmqangaw qnlhangan, kngkawas 2011 o niqan 12 Netherlands ciyey mtmay 'QNLANGAN 500 Mbiyax'. Mray so: Netherlands Hwangcya Shell Citwan (Spoda Netherlands Hwangcya Gasoring Kojyo mi Ingkoko Shell Mphaqon mi Mawyi Kojyo mniq kngkawas 1907 wada mnsopo, kiya ka qnlangan knbeyhing balay kongyey kojyo ori, wada mbiyax mniq qnlangan 500 ciyey to2 bang, kiya mi gasoring mi sohwa jnryaw na to2 bang biyax dha pnyahan mi pbari, kiya ka qnlangan to2 knbeyhing gasoring kojyo); Philips tyeynco kojyo (pnhiyo kngkawas 1891, mniq qnlangan 500 mbiyax ciyey to277 bnkowan, mniq kcka qnlangan tyeynco ciyey tnbkowan tobrah 10 bang. Qori so camaaw pkrdax, klowan rakaw syeynsyangkwan, teyntong ssaqic ngodos, X rdax honsiyi mi pradiyo sepey mniq mntna qqpahan niya pa ida mniq brah ka hnyowan dha); Ryeynho Rihwa kojyo (pnhiyo kngkawas 1930, mniq qnlangan 500 mbiyax ciyey kcka o to136 tbnkowan, kiya ka qnlhangan knbeyhing balay ddiyon kddiyax mi ooqon sngcan ciyey ori, psowan Rotterdam mi London ddha congpo), Netherlands o seykining ppeyyah ooqon, Ingkoko ka seykining ppeyyah qqiya ddiyon kddiyax); Akso Nobel Kojyo (nniqan bay hnhangan qnlangan hwakong mi qqpahon iyo, kngkawas 1994 snpeyyah Netherlands Akso kojyo mi Sweden Nobel kojyo pnspowan kiya, mniq qnlangan 500 mbiyax ciyey o tbkowan 479). Qpahan pnwalang Netherlands ka kcka qnlhangan qqpahan pnwalang mrana balay qnlhangan ori, nngalan knkana kcka qnlhangan 2% ka qqpahan pnwalang o, kiya ka qnlangan poso balay pnyahan qqpahan pnwalang qnlhangan ori. Pnspowan kcka qqpahan pnwalang o, qqpahan tmabo tnbowan ka 50%, qqpahan pphpah mi qqhoni ka 38%, qqpahan phoma ka 12%. Kngkawas 2005 cida Netherlands o mnsmlanan pnyahan pnwalang mi ooqon coko nngalan pila o 789.3 oko pila Amirika na ndanan dha. Netherlands o pdkanan taxa sediq o niqan 1/10 dapa, 1 baboy, mniq qqpahan tmabo tnbowan wada mtrawah qnlhangan hangryey. Dxral qnlhangan Netherlands o wana balay 41500 pinghwang km, binaw knkana qnlhangan o niqan 110 pinghwang km ka ngalan dha wenso phoma pphpah mi hiyi pnwalang mi sama, so kiya wada mangal 'O Co Nniqan Phpah' ka knmalo hangan dha. Pphpah ka poso balay qqpahan pnyahan dmkoh Netherlands, tnkawas coko dhoq 100 oko pila O weyn, coko ryang o knkana kwoci socang 60%. Netherlands ka pnyahan qnlangan weloq miriko knbeyhing balay qnlhangan, qnlangan babaw dxral knnama balay phiyo Hawta Weloq Miroko Cyawyi Congsin nniqan balay hnhangan dha ori, diyax ndan dha o wada niqan 300 kngkawas qnbsyaqan da. Kiya ori o, Netherlands ka poso balay qnlhangan pyahan phoma bonga tomon ori. Ppanan rolo Ppanan aso mi rolo Netherlands pa mndongos balay. Elo yayong kcka qnlhangan mndongos balay, elo aso o ppwalok mi mndongos balay ori. Mqori tohonac pyahan Ucilong Daya ka Yayong Rhine ka mtbiyax balay yayong knkana qnlangan ppanan aso ori. Kiya mi rhngon yayong ka Rotterdam ka knkana qnlangan knbeyhing balay tdrowan aso, twentoryang o mn42 kngkawas knkana qnlangan to1ci bang. Ppanan skoki Amsterdam ka poso balay ppanan skoki O Co, mnoo balay wada mangal hangan knmalo balay ppanan skoki knkana qnlangan. Mdho balay lnlongan dha qqlahang lnglingay dxral ka Netherlands, txtaxa sediq jncyon o niqan 2 ddeyngsya, ddeyngsya ka poso balay ppanan dha, alang mkbrnox o wada smlowan lxanan balay elo ddaon ddeyngsya. Howoyey Snpeyyah 20 th 80 kngkkawas dhoq saya, howoyey ka wada ini biyaw mrana, wada mposo balay stmanan keyjay sediq qnlhangan Netherlands. Poso balay qqpahan pnyahan ka ppanan, ginghang, pawsyeyn, koso, rryawan mi ooqan mi mmahan. N=Niqan oo nniqan bay hnhangan ginghang mi cinjong ciko ka Netherlands. Mray so : Netherlands Ginghang (Snpeyyah Netherlands Tongyong Ginghang mi Amsterdam-Rotterdam Ginghang mnniq kngkawas 1991 pnspowan dha, mniq knkana qnlangan o niqan 3000 sngari cida ciko niya, kiya ka knkana qnlangan niqan ginghang wangrwo knoo balay ori. Ginghang tnbkowan O Co o wa mniq tobrah 10, qnlhangan o wa mniq tobrah20); Netherlands Kwoci Citwan (kiya ka ING, snpeyyah Netherlands congcang- Yobing Citwan mi Netherlands Kwomin Jnso Pawsyeyn Kojyo mniq kngkawas 1991 pnspowan dha. Kiya ka to1 knbeyhing balay cinjong ciko, mniq kngkawas 2011 kcka Knkana Qnlangan 500 Mbiyax Ciyey o to17 tnbkowan niya); Netherlands Qqpahan Pnwalang Hcwo Ginghang (Spoda Netherlands oo balay nongcwen sinyongso mniq kngkawas 1973 pnspowan dha, kiya ka Netherlands to2 knbeyhing ginghang, mniq knkana qnlangan o to50 mbiyax niya). Qqpahan mpriwaw Niqan 'O Co Nniqan Pphpah' mi 'Qnlhangan Rolo Bwihor' sonca dha lmawa ka Netherlands, qqpahan rmiwaw o mrana balay, niqan balay hnhangan ka qnepah dha hmtor ocilong smmalo elo, malo balay qtan ka pnhmanan cyo pphpah yocinsyang (Netherlands o niqan 'Yocinsyang Wangkwo' sonca hangan dha, yocinsyang ka phpah qnlhangan dha), nniqan bay hangan ka weloq miriko alang mkbrnox tiping Hawta (niqan knkana qnlangan to1 weloq miroko cyawyi congsin), htngayan balay ncbiyaw hngakan ka knbeyhing bay rrolo bwihor (Netherlands ka oo bay rolo bwihor na qnlhangan) kiya ka malo balay sanan sdmhaw rmiwaw kana. Mqori ngangoc mawyi Netherlands pa kndadax cbiyaw daw ida kiya mawyi mbiyax balay qnlhangan, mniq 17 th tobrah cida niqan 'Macoho Ucilong' sonca dha tmhangan, soto Amsterdam mniq cida ka hniwan niya o mntna balay so New York saya. Ana dhoq saya, Netherlands oqori so mqori ngangoc mawyi pa ida mniq dmodol balay knkana qnlangan, Netherlands ka msnol bokoy Amirika mi France na knkana qnlangan to3 pnyahan pnwalang coko qnlhangan. Poso balay cinko Netherlands ka kongyey weyryaw, weynyo gasoring, pancngpin mi kikay ori. 60% na pnyahan ka ngalaan coko, poso balay ka smnalo gasoring, tyeynco canpin, aso mi pnyahan pnwalang ori.
